activities: Employee information is used for business purposes (e.g. administration, benefits, planning, etc.). Supplier and Customer information is collected when entering into a business relationship, placing orders, etc.
contacttitle1: SVP, General Counsel, Chief Compliance Officer
corpofftitle1: SVP, General Counsel, Chief Compliance Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line and manual human resources data regarding employees; online customer, supplier and contact data
recoursemech: If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution using an independent resource mechanism, such as those offered by JAMS, to hear each complaint in compliance with the Safe Harbor Framework.
